filters.q: New Interest on an existing guest card

parameters.text:
=Extract the following information from this lead inquiry email. Use only the information explicitly written in the content — do not make up or assume anything.

- Full Name  
- Email Address  
- Phone Number  
- Property Address (what the lead is interested in)  
- Lead Comments (what the lead wants or asked)  
- Source (such as Zillow, Rent.com, etc. - if mentioned)

Return the result in this exact JSON format:

{
  "name": "",
  "email": "",
  "phone": "",
  "address": "",
  "comments": "",
  "source": ""
}

{{ $json.text }}
parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "name": "Mckayla Kauffman",
  "email": "dawnie83099@gmail.com",
  "phone": "(806) 731-2558",
  "address": "2003 N Spring",
  "comments": "I would like to schedule a tour. Would any of these dates work for you? Saturday (2/22)",
  "source": "Zillow Rental Network"
}

parameters.subject: ={{ $json.manager_name }} You have a new lead for {{ $json.Property_Street_Address_1 }}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
[
  {
    "first_name": "Maribel",
    "last_name": "Cabrales",
    "property": "Evergreen Apartments - 820 Evergreen Amarillo, TX 79107",
    "unit": "1466846",
    "move_in_date": "2022-03-01",
    "lease_to_date": "2023-02-28",
    "move_out_date": "2023-01-30",
    "balance": 2919.59,
    "in_collections": "Yes",
    "late_count": 8,
    "tenant_tags": "Texas Rent Relief",
    "summary": "Tenant Maribel Cabrales was the obligated party on the lease at Evergreen Apartments, Unit 1466846. The lease began on 2022-03-01 and was scheduled to end on 2023-02-28. The tenant moved out on 2023-01-30, which is within 30 days of the lease end date, indicating likely lease fulfillment. However, the tenant left with an unpaid balance of $2,919.59, accrued 8 late payments, and the account was sent to collections. There were no documented delinquency notes, but the financial history indicates chronic payment issues.",
    "eligible": false,
    "url": "https://blazepropertymanagement.appfolio.com/occupancies/1144/selected_tenant/1561"
  }
]

parameters.subject: =Lead {{ $json.output[0].first_name }} {{ $json.output[0].last_name }} is Ineligible
parameters.message:
= ⚠️ Ineligible Past Tenant Alert

🚫 Ineligible Past Tenant Detected

Full Name: {{ $json.output[0].first_name }} {{ $json.output[0].last_name }}

Property: {{ $json.output[0].property }}

Unit: {{ $json.output[0].unit }}

Move-In Date: {{ $json.output[0].move_in_date }}

Lease-To Date: {{ $json.output[0].lease_to_date }}

Move-Out Date: {{ $json.output[0].move_out_date }}

Balance Owed: ${{ $json.output[0].balance }}

In Collections: {{ $json.output[0].in_collections }}

Late Payments: {{ $json.output[0].late_count }}

Tenant Tags: {{ $json.tenant_tags || "(none)" }}

Summary:
{{ $json.output[0].summary }}

🔗 Tenant Record:
View in AppFolio

This message was generated automatically by Blaze Real Estate's lead screening system.

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  First AS manager_first,
  Last AS manager_last,
  email AS manager_email,
  property_id,
  group_id
FROM lead_router;

SELECT 
  Property_ID,
  Property_Group_ID_s_,
  Property_Street_Address_1,
  Property_Type
FROM properties_raw
WHERE 
  Address_Number = '{{ $json.address_number }}'

SELECT *
FROM past_tenants
WHERE 
  (
    LOWER(first_name) = LOWER('{{ $json.first_name }}')
    AND LOWER(last_name) = LOWER('{{ $json.last_name }}')
  )
  OR LOWER(email_1) = LOWER('{{ $json.email }}')
  OR REPLACE(phone_1, '-', '') = REPLACE('{{ $json.phone }}', '-', '');

parameters.subject: ={{ $json.manager_name }} You have a new lead for {{ $json.Property_Street_Address_1 }}
